name: Edmund Berrigan
bio: Edmund Berrigan is the author of the poetry collections More Gone (City Lights, 2019), Glad Stone Children (Farfalla, 2008), and Disarming Matter (Owl Press, 1999), as well as the memoir Can It! (Letter Machine Editions, 2013). He edited Selected Poems of Steve Carey (Sub Press, 2009), and with Anselm Berrigan and Alice Notley he is coeditor of The Collected Poems of Ted Berrigan (University of California Press, 2005) and The Selected Poems of Ted Berrigan (University of California Press, 2010).
